subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.tutorial: Need a video tutorial? Click here.

api.content: To begin, you need a Gemini API Key to subscribe. Click the 'Get Key' button below to obtain a free API Key from Google.

error.keyRequired: Please enter your Gemini API key.

google.configError: Configuration error: Google Client ID not found.
google.content: Please enter your username or you can link it to your Google account.

error.nameLengthError: Your name must be between 3 and 20 characters.
error.nameFormatError: Your name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
error.nameFormatError2: Your name cannot contain special characters.

profile.content: We commit to not using or storing any of your information outside of the eMastery application. Your data solely serves in-app experience.

error.ageFormatError: Age must be a valid number.

features.dictionaryDesc: Look up vocabulary, see detailed explanations, and real-world examples.
features.quizDesc: Challenge yourself with fun quizzes and test your knowledge.
features.chatbotDesc: Chat with the AI assistant to practice conversation and get answers.
features.writingDesc: Improve writing skills through exercises and suggestions.
features.developing: We are researching and developing additional features to better support English learning.

tip.title: Tip of the Day
tip.content: Try to use 3 new words you learned today in a conversation. Repetition is the key to memorization!

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the eMastery! How can I help you today?
chatbot.info: eMastery may make mistakes, so please verify eMastery answers.

error.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
error.apiError: API error. Please try again later.

error.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
error.apiError: API error. Please try again later.

dictionary.welcome: Look up English vocabulary to see definitions, pronunciation, examples, and more.
dictionary.title: eMastery Dictionary

error.valid: Only single English words are supported, without special characters.
error.apiKey: API Key is missing. Please refresh the page.

notFound.title: Word not found
notFound.description: Please check the spelling or try another word.

welcome.title: Unlock Your English Potential with eMastery

dictionary.title: Smart Dictionary
dictionary.description: Instantly look up words with detailed explanations, usage examples, and fun facts.

writing.title: Writing Practice
writing.description: Enhance your writing skills with guided exercises and personalized feedback.

quiz.title: Interactive Quizzes
quiz.description: Test your knowledge with engaging puzzles that adapt to your skill level.

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.description: Chat with our friendly AI to practice conversation and get instant answers.

logout.title: Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to log out? All search history and chat conversations will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
